title: Punishing system for leaving too many games
body:
Over the past few days or possibly month, I have left a small number of games for no more than 2-5 minutes due to graphical and audio issues in my game. Due to this, I eventually accumulated enough 'leave-game credits' to be placed in low priority queue.

My problem with this and the crux of my point is that the games I left were for such a short period of time that the impact on the overall game would be mainly negligible. I understand leaving games is frowned upon but I am thinking that there should be a system implemented - if possible - that means you don't accrue 'leave-game credits' if you leave the game for less than 5 minutes.

I know something like this will be something that will get opposition and I believe me when I say I have considered opposing points but I am sure that there are many players out there who have felt miffed by being place in low priority from only leaving games for less than 5 minutes

Thank you for reading
